text:
Drop your 🇺🇸 FED rate cut predictions 

25 BPS or 50 BPS ?

MY PREDICTION FOR TODAY'S FOMC 

- If the FED cuts rates by 25 bps, markets will dump after the event because 25 is already priced in. (The market will pump hard if we get a 50 bps cut because that’s the bullish surprise everyone wants. ) 
- This becomes “sell the news” and US stocks dump from here, taking crypto with it. 
- We see the market dumping towards the end of September, everyone gets bearish, BTC dumps close to $100k, and ETH to $3800. 
- Market makers liquidate all the longs. 
- As soon as everyone becomes bearish, the market bounces back in early October. 
- Bitcoin hits new ATH $150k+ in Oct-Nov, and ETH follows it to $7500-$10,000. 
- Then BTC dominance drops, money starts flowing into alts, and we see 2-3 months of MEGA ALTSEASON where alts pump 10x-50x. 
- We get the Q4 parabolic pump like 2017 and 2021.
- Markets explode with back-to-back rate cuts until Q1 2026. 
- We retire our entire bloodline. 

Hit like and repost if I should do more predictions like this.

BREAKING: 🇨🇦 CANADA CENTRAL BANK CUT RATES BY 25BPS. THE FED WILL DO THE SAME.

MASSIVE LIQUIDITY IS COMING 🚀
BREAKING: STANDARD CHARTERED SAYS FED MAY SURPRISE MARKETS WITH 50BPS RATE CUT.

THIS IS HOW ALTS WILL PUMP AFTER FED RATE CUTS.

ARE YOU READY?

BREAKING: 🇬🇧 UK REGULATOR TO EASE BITCOIN AND CRYPTO REGULATIONS.

BULLISH 🔥

$BTC IS HAVING ITS BEST EVER SEPTEMBER IN 13 YEARS.

EVERYTIME BITCOIN HAS CLOSED SEPTEMBER IN GREEN, OCTOBER AND NOVEMBER HAVE BEEN GIGA BULLISH.

BREAKING: 🇯🇵 METAPLANET RAISES $1.4 BILLION TO BUY MORE BITCOIN.

SUPPLY SHOCK IS REAL 🔥

REMINDER 🚨

FOMC RATE CUT DECISION WILL HAPPEN TODAY AT 2PM ET.

THE MARKET IS EXPECTING 95% PROBABILITY OF A 25BPS CUT.

AT 2:30PM ET, POWELL PRESS CONFERENCE WILL START.

IF POWELL HINTS OF MORE RATE CUTS, MARKETS WILL GO PARABOLIC.
BREAKING: 🇺🇲 BLACKROCK AND FIDELITY JUST BOUGHT $255 MILLION WORTH OF BITCOIN.

🇺🇸 FED will do 2-3 rate cuts in 2025

Liquidity will flow into market 

Crypto market will explode    

$ETH will hit $10,000

altcoins will pump 10x-50x

Be Patient.

🇺🇸 A TOTAL OF $1.26 TRILLION HAS BEEN ADDED TO THE US STOCK MARKET IN THE LAST TWO DAYS

BULLISH FOR CRYPTO !!!

🇺🇸 PUBLICLY TRADED CLEANCORE SOLUTIONS JUST BOUGHT 100,000,000 $DOGE WORTH $26.8 MILLION

BULLISH FOR ALTCOINS 🔥

LARGE CAPS ARE PUMPING HARD 

NEXT MONEY WILL FLOW INTO MID 
AND LOW CAP COINS  = ALTSEASON

WE ARE SO CLOSE TO MAKING IT 🔥

$LYFT flying off this headline  👀
$GOOGL WAYMO & $LYFT PARTNER TO BRING ROBOTAXIS TO NASHVILLE IN 2026

DON’T BELIEVE THE $NVDA & CHINA FUD

China revenue going to zero doesn’t kill the bull case -- global inference demand will soak it up. The real question is if Beijing can afford the lag.

Domestic chips mean $BABA & others fall years behind in model quality, inference economics & ecosystem lock-in.

That’s why this plays out less as “lost demand” & more as “smuggled demand.”

$NVDA CEO: DISAPPOINTED WITH WHAT I SEE IN CHINA

Says they’ll serve the market only if China actually wants them there  👀

Vector’s $200M+ in federal contracts accelerates IonQ’s push into quantum sensing and strengthens its full-stack platform for national security applications.

"Being with Rogan for the aftermath of it was helpful."

"If that's where we've wound up, it cannot be where we stay."

"It's too surreal to process it! It's just the unfairness of it."

"He didn't demean people. He didn't ridicule people. He didn't belittle or embarrass or gotcha. He showed up as prepared as you could have been, as passionate as you could have been. And just asked people to just have an open debate."

"We can't keep having days like that moving forward."

Uber Freight $UBER is partnering with Tesla $TSLA on its Dedicated EV Fleet Accelerator Program, which aims to boost adoption of electric semi adoption, offering subsidies for Tesla Semi purchases and pre-arranged freight and route planning to increase utilization.
Nvidia $NVDA is also working closely with UK cloud partner Nscale to boost its global expansion to scale up to 300,000 Blackwell GPUs worldwide, with 60,000 in the UK.
CoreWeave $CRWV is committing £1.5B for AI data center capacity in the UK, working alongside Nvidia $NVDA and Nscale to bring tens of thousands of Blackwell Ultra GPUs online through next year.

Nvidia $NVDA and partners Nscale, Microsoft $MSFT and CoreWeave $CRWV will deploy 120,000 Blackwell Ultra GPUs across the UK by the end of 2026 under an £11 billion investment to boost local data centers.

Microsoft $MSFT is investing $30 billion to expand AI infrastructure in the UK through 2028, including $15 billion for capex. 

Microsoft will also build a new supercomputer in partnership with Nscale featuring 23K GPUs. 

$GOOG $AMZN $NVDA

Broadcom $AVGO revealed last week that it has the key ingredients to grow AI revenue at a much faster pace than Nvidia $NVDA next year.   

We broke this down for premium members and what investors must know from Q3 below.
io-fund.com/premium-services…

Abu Dhabi-based AI investment firm MGX has joined Silver Lake in purchasing a majority 51% stake in Intel's $INTC Altera, valuing the FPGA unit at $8.75B, far below the $17B Intel paid for the firm in 2015.

AI robotics startup Figure raised $1 billion in its latest funding round valuing the firm at $39 billion, with participation from Nvidia $NVDA, Salesforce $CRM, Intel Capital $INTC and Qualcomm Ventures $QCOM.

Alphabet $GOOG is investing $6.8 billion to boost the UK's AI development over the next two years, opening a new state-of-the-art data center north of London.
